text: The Workflow Bridge forwarding agent is responsible for sending data to a Workflow Bridge collection agent. The section contains the following subsections: Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent Configuration Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent Events Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent Transaction Behavior, Input/Output Data and MIM
title: Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
